attributes.action: Ban the sale of any mobile phone with a camera
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The ban of this piece of equipment will stop infringement of peoples privacy and stop the use of them to record violence for uploading to social networking sites, and sites of the type of youtube.
         There is no requirement for them and their ban will help stop bullying and other violent acts deemed fun to post on the internet.
